description: This file defines the route handlers for task-related API endpoints in an Express.js application. It includes GET and POST handlers for retrieving and creating tasks, currently unimplemented.

methods.name: router.get
methods.description: Handles GET requests to the '/' endpoint for retrieving tasks (not yet implemented).

methods.name: router.post
methods.description: Handles POST requests to the '/' endpoint for creating tasks (not yet implemented).
